Subskills.name: Lethal Spearstorm
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by spearnage.

Subskills.name: Spear Storm
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of spears thrown.

Subskills.name: Spinning to Win
Subskills.description: Rapidly throw spears around you for a short duration dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Accurate Spearing
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using spearnage.

Subskills.name: Thundertips
Subskills.description: Increases lightning damage dealt by spearnage.

Subskills.name: Timefunneling Spears
Subskills.description: Spears grow in size and gain increased damage while traveling.

Subskills.name: Pointy Ends
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict armor break on hit.

Subskills.name: Explosive Speartips
Subskills.description: Spears now explode on hit dealing area of effect damage on an increased radius.

Subskills.name: Swiftstepping
Subskills.description: Decreases movement diminish when using spearnage.

Subskills.name: Sudden Flank
Subskills.description: Spears have a chance to ricochet towards another target on hit.

Subskills.name: Lightning Ball
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to spawn a ball of lightning traveling towards the target dealing lightning damage and inflicting lightning break.

Subskills.name: Boomerang Spears
Subskills.description: Spears now return to you dealing increased damage.
